ygData.subject: RE: <-------idiot
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello everyone :) Well I just wanted to tell you a little tale so that you can all remember not to make my mistakes.  Last night, I made the mistake of
ygData.messageBody:
Hello everyone :)

Well I just wanted to tell you a little tale so that you can all remember
not to make my mistakes. Last night, I made the mistake of consenting
someone to drag Tani's corpse out of the Scryer room in Guk. Well, long
story short, all my armor and weapons were stolen (punishment for twinking,
heh) by this guy.

There are all sorts of complicating sidelines to this story which I'll spare
you. Although I know it was always a risk, I just never thought someone
would be so mean and viscious. The items are just items, but people that do
that stuff just plain suck!

Guess I'll have to make a contest to see how much of my quest stuff I can
get back in one week.

Hope you're all having a great day... and DON'T CONSENT SOMEONE YOU DON'T
KNOW!!!
(most of you have probably figured that out - guess I get to wear the naive
banner for the week)

Tani 20th nekkid Bard
Halana 50th Shamana
Solusek Ro


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
